name.en: Sworn Supporter of the Celestial Saint
name.ja: <ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby><ruby>継<rt>つ</rt></ruby>ぎ<ruby>人<rt>ひと</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, pay 500 LP.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, you cannot activate the effect of "Sworn Supporter of the Celestial Saint".
